landingPage.heroSubtitle: The all-in-one platform to manage employee shifts, track performance, and streamline your operations. Stop planning, start leading.
landingPage.featuresTitle: Everything you need, nothing you don't.
landingPage.featuresSubtitle: Quick Shift is built to be powerful yet simple. Discover how our core features can transform your daily operations.
landingPage.feature1Desc: Build and adjust schedules in seconds with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface. React to changes instantly and publish updates with a single click.
landingPage.feature2Desc: Go beyond simple scheduling. Our dashboard provides actionable insights into labor costs, hours scheduled, and attendance trends to help you make smarter decisions.
landingPage.feature3Desc: Manage all employee profiles, roles, and availability in one place. Keep your roster organized and easily accessible for faster shift assignments.
landingPage.testimonialsSubtitle: Managers and owners are saving hours every week and reducing scheduling headaches with Quick Shift.
landingPage.testimonial1Quote: Quick Shift has been a game-changer. I used to spend hours on spreadsheets. Now, I create the weekly schedule in 15 minutes. The drag-and-drop is just brilliant.
landingPage.testimonial2Quote: The dashboard gives me a clear overview of my staffing and costs without needing to pull complex reports. It helps me stay on budget and spot trends early.
landingPage.testimonial3Quote: Assigning shifts based on roles and availability used to be a constant puzzle. Quick Shift streamlined the entire process. Our staff loves the clarity.
landingPage.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that matches the size and ambitions of your business. Simple and transparent.
landingPage.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of businesses that have taken control of their employee management. Start your free trial today.
landingPage.footerDesc: The modern platform for intuitive employee scheduling.
landingPage.footer: Â© {year} Quick Shift. All rights reserved.
